title: Oklahoma City National Memorial: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Evening Program  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Evening Program  There will not be an 8:00pm evening program on the following Fridays and Saturdays: July 15th and 16th and July 22nd and 23rd.
